mapper.select:
select
from gd_computers
1=1
AND cpt_name like CONCAT('%','${cptName}','%')
AND cpt_ram like CONCAT('%','${cptRam}','%')
AND cpt_cpu like CONCAT('%','${cptCpu}','%')
AND cpt_os = #{cptOs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND cpt_graphicscard like CONCAT('%','${cptGraphicscard}','%')
AND cpt_islending = #{cptIslending,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT cpt_id, cpt_name, cpt_price, cpt_icon, cpt_os, cpt_cpu, cpt_ram, cpt_rom, cpt_screensize, cpt_graphicscard, cpt_islending, cpt_lendtime, cpt_returntime, cpt_who, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3 FROM gd_computers
